intro: I'm Jacob Goodwin, a Web Developer experienced in writing Single Page Applications. I have also worked with backend technologies such as Go, Nodejs, gRPC, and GraphQL.
about: A few years ago I started enjoying online programming courses as a post-work hobby. It started with Python and evolved into web development. I have since learned numerous technologies and have decided to turn my hobby into a new career! Please check out my skills and portfolio to see what I can do for you.
I previously worked for as an electronics engineer, most recently for an electromagnetics simulation software company supporting several top Silicon Valley companies.
